banda, ohe kiyanawa gana deyiya aawath nan ohege hamputha tharan alankareta rata karawanda ba kiyala. me katha walata janathawa wasayen api hina wenta oona koyi paththenda kiyala ohege lokkagen ahala kiyanawada eelanga para bahadakinta giyama? thawath ekak ahanda thiyenawa aayibowan… wiyangodala ratin pita indan liyanawa wage nathuwa apita boru nan walin liyanta wela thiyenne kudalagena gihin marayi kiyana baya hindayi.  oheta ehema bayakuth nathikota, ohege hamputha kalpa hathalis laksayak paninakaluth sakwithikan karana bawa oheta siyeta-siyak wiswasakota, me boru nan walin liyanta oheta thiyena uwamanawa mokadda kiyana ekath poddak lehala denawada eelanga para liyanakota? ”demalagenuyi, marakkalayagenuyi, ape thawthisawa gilinta wena wadak nathuwa as gedi uluppana ude hawa kela perana ‘adirajyawadiyagenuyi’ berenta” kiyala ohe kiyanta ida thibbath, ee tharamma hurathal boruwak ohe nokiyana bawa apita wiswasayi.
